billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Enhances tax incentives for the purchase of long-term care insurance policies
summary: Enhances tax incentives for the purchase of long-term care insurance policies; provides a credit of 75% of premium paid for the first year, 50% for the second year and 25% in the third year.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to long-term care insurance tax credits
